title: Mysterious Iquitos 3D/2N

itinerary.day: Day 01: Flight to Iquitos - City Tour

activities.text: Flight and arrival in Iquitos, airport reception and transfer to the hotel. Panoramic tour of the city: squares, cathedrals, and riverfront promenade. Free time.

itinerary.day: Day 02: Full Day Amazon and Pedrito Farm

activities.text: Boat departure on the Amazon River. Observation of pink river dolphins. Visit to the Yagua tribe to learn about their culture, dances, and blowgun use. Lunch at an Amazon lodge. Continue to Barrio Florido and walk to Pedrito Farm to see caimans, paiches, and Victoria regia. Return to Iquitos.
Breakfast. Free time to enjoy the hotel or go shopping. Transfer to the airport. End of the tour.

includes: 02 nights accommodation in *** hotel with pool
Tours according to itinerary (2 days of excursions)
Agency staff accompanying the entire trip
Entrance tickets to all tourist attractions
